thread.title: Michael Moore
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Michael Moore

author: Michael Moore
title: Michael Moore
text: What an amazing experience! They gave my children balloons coming in the door and offered my husband and I coffee and water while we shopped. The customer service was impeccable and they delivered ALL of our items the same day. We will definitely be back.
